attributes.action: bail out all homeowners that are about to be repossessed
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Since the government shows that it is prepared to bail out hugely irresponsible banks, with enormous amounts of money, to stop them going bankrupt, a new law should be passed to protect the ordinary humble tax paying homeowner also.

It would be very simple to set up a structure, whereby if a home-owner reaches the stage of getting into a repossession state, that the government/council steps in, takes over the property, and rents it back to the original owner for a minimum 10 years period, whereby the owner may attempt to repurchase the property if they are able, or simply continue the rental.  After the 10 year period the government/council may sell the property to the general public.

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence:

http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/Save-our-homes/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
